descriptionComponent.title: Transforming systems into modern solutions for
descriptionComponent.about:
As a scientist in the IT field, I elevate web project development to a new level, using my knowledge to create systems that not only meet but exceed expectations in terms of scalability, robustness, modularity, and responsiveness.
My ability to manage all aspects of a project, from interface design to full backend control, highlights me as a versatile and innovative professional.
descriptionComponent.services:
My work as a full-stack developer covers all layers of software, ensuring that each project benefits from the latest technologies.

On the frontend, I apply advanced concepts to create engaging and reactive interfaces, while on the backend, I develop robust APIs in Node.js that ensure efficiency and scalability.

My goal is always to deliver solutions that are at the cutting edge of technology and that truly make a difference.
descriptionComponent.experience:
My experience ranges from developing complex systems to effective management and communication with clients and development teams.

A large part of my projects has been for doctors and healthcare professionals, creating systems that address the specific needs of this sector. Always focusing on simplifying the user journey and optimizing operations.

Below, you will find concrete examples of how I have transformed ideas into standout solutions.

otherProjects.title: Other Projects
otherProjects.subtitle: Check out other projects I developed, all with the same dedication and quality.

experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Leading development of scalable web applications using modern technologies and best practices.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects with focus on performance and user experience.
